headline: Evertis selects Honeywell Aclar Technology for pharmaceutical packaging
summary: By integrating Aclar films into its PET packaging, Evertis aims to optimise manufacturing processes.

raw.headline: Evertis selects Honeywell Aclar Technology for pharmaceutical packaging

headline: HONEYWELL COMPLETES ACQUISITION OF SUNDYNE TO EXPAND PROCESS INDUSTRY CAPABILITIES
summary: Honeywell (NASDAQ: HON) today announced the completion of its acquisition of Sundyne from private equity firm Warburg Pincus for $2.16 billion in an all-cash transaction. The acquisition of Sundyne—a leader in the design, manufacturing, and aftermarket support of highly-engineered pumps and gas compressors for process industries—is expected to be immediately accretive to Honeywell's sales growth and segment margins as well as to adjusted EPS in the first full year of ownership.
